definition: of a deep somewhat purplish blue color similar to that of a clear October sky, a light shade of blue, to color blue
details:
adjective
- of a deep somewhat purplish blue color similar to that of a clear October sky
= synonyms: cerulean, sky-blue, bright blue
noun
- a light shade of blue
= synonyms: cerulean, sky-blue, sapphire, lazuline
verb
- to color blue
= example: to color blue
